name: Pumpkin King
description:
Your goal is to become the THE PUMPKIN KING! Navigate through Pumpkin Patch Hills and eat all the pumpkins you find! The LESS Pumpkins there are in the level the MORE big you get! Watch out for Pumpkins Bombs though they will blow you away if you get too close!

Made for BTP Game Jam #3 January 2021. The Game Jam theme is "Less is More". Check out Blackthornprod on Youtube!

Controls:

W,A,S,D or Left, Right, Up, Down - move.

Escape - Bring up menu.

Software Used:

Game Engine - Unity3D.

3D Modeling - Autodesk Maya, Zbrush.

Texturing - Substance Painter, Substance Designer, Procreate.

Credits:

Programming - PumpkinKingIsDead

Art - PumpkinKingIsDead

(3rd party assets)
Music- "A Casual Music Pack" by Cafofo
Sound Effects - "Universal Sound FX" by Imphenzia

***PLEASE RATE MY GAME!***

Please Comment Below! Let me know what you think about my game! This is my first Game Jam in ItchIO. :)
